Write-Up Text: From people discussing tax cuts affecting income inequality to economists analyzing educational costs and women's advocates noting changes in parenting policies these posts showcase an array of varied voices and interests on the upcoming Federal Budget. The topics emerging show the likes of cost-of-living relief measures gains for small targets and allocated funds for electricity relief. With different tags such as #auspol #7News and #indaily the social media responses give us a glimpse of the many opinions and concerns in the Australian public regarding the forthcoming budget.
